testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Two ap establish amrp neighbor successfully
Test Procedure: 1: Configure mgt0 vlan different from native vlan on ap1, assume 58 and 57 result 1 2: Check the amrp debug packets on ap1, result 2 3: Configure mgt0 vlan and native vlan are the same on ap1, assume 58, repeat step 2, result 3

step.desc: Two ap establish amrp neighbor successfully
step.console: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}"

step.desc: Two ap establish amrp neighbor successfully
step.console: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}"

step.desc: set filter and debug config on AP1
step.console: -v "logging debug" -v "_ff src-mac ${ap2.mgt0.mac} bidirection" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "_kdebug eth vlan" -v "_kdebug fe vlan" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: AP1: Configure mgt0 vlan different from native vlan on ap1, assume 58 and 57 result 1
step.console: -v "clear log all" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show interface mgt0"

step.desc: 2: Check the eth debug packets on ap1, result 2
2: Check the amrp debug packets on ap1, result 2
step.console: -v "show logging buffered | include \"set llc pkt vlan\""

step.desc: 3: Configure mgt0 vlan and native vlan are the same on ap1, assume 58, repeat step 2, result 3
check logging debug on AP1 for eth pkts
check logging debug on AP1 for llc pkts
step.console: -v "show logging buffered | include \"set llc pkt vlan\""
